title: Background Research: OpenAI Deep-Research
intro: Compelling strategy needs credible proof. Investors & customers will ask "Why should customers believe your claim?" In this phase you'll commission OpenAI's Deep-Research engine to compile a tightly-sourced dossier of peer-reviewed findings that validate your core benefit (e.g., play-driven learning, AI-assisted wellness). The resulting PDF will: • Fuel the authority of your marketing copy, podcast, and voice agent • Supply headline statistics and inform the creation of other communications assets • Provide citations savvy stakeholders can audit

promptTemplate:
**ROLE**

You are a research specialist conducting deep academic research to validate business claims.

**CONTEXT**

Company: {{phase1.company_name}}
Sector: {{phase1.sector}}
Target Region: {{phase1.target_region}}
Core Benefit: {{benefit_keyword}}

**RESEARCH PARAMETERS**

Evidence Horizon: Studies from the last {{evidence_horizon}} years
Tone Preference: {{tone_preference}}
Statistic Style: {{statistic_style}}
Additional Focus: {{research_focus}}

**TASK**

Conduct comprehensive deep research to compile a tightly-sourced dossier of peer-reviewed findings that validate our core benefit: {{benefit_keyword}}.

**RESEARCH REQUIREMENTS**

1. **Key Findings Section**
   - Find 5-7 peer-reviewed studies that support {{benefit_keyword}}
   - Focus on studies from the last {{evidence_horizon}} years
   - Include methodology and sample sizes where relevant
   - Prioritize studies with strong statistical significance

2. **Marketing Statistics**
   - Extract headline-worthy statistics in {{statistic_style}} format
   - Focus on quantifiable benefits and outcomes
   - Include confidence intervals where available
   - Provide context for each statistic

3. **Pull-Quotes for Authority**
   - Select compelling quotes from researchers in {{tone_preference}} tone
   - Choose quotes that directly support {{benefit_keyword}}
   - Include author credentials and institutional affiliations
   - Ensure quotes are impactful for marketing use

4. **Complete References**
   - Full APA citations for all sources
   - Include DOI numbers where available
   - Verify all sources are from reputable journals or institutions
   - Organize references alphabetically

**OUTPUT FORMAT**

Structured PDF-ready document with clear sections, proper citations, and executive summary suitable for investor presentations and marketing materials.

decisionBoxContent.title: Pre-prompt Choices
decisionBoxContent.subtitle: Before commissioning your deep research, make these three strategic decisions that will shape the quality and usefulness of your evidence.

items.label: Decision
items.content: How recent must studies be? **Default: last 10 years.** You may tighten to 5 years for fast-moving tech sectors.

items.label: Decision
items.content: Choose either **academic gravitas** or **relatable practitioner** tone for your research citations and quotes.

items.label: Decision
items.content: **Percentages** vs. **absolute gains** (helps later headline selection). This will determine how impact is presented in your marketing materials.

action.title: Action
items: Write your three choices; you will paste them into the prompt.
Record especially {{benefit_keyword}}, {{sector}}, and {{target_region}} for the research focus.

stepByStepFlow.action: **Customize** and adapt the Phase 3 Prompt (below) for your company. **Replace** placeholders with your horizon, tone, stat style; **insert** variables.

**Submit**. Deep-Research will consider your request for a few seconds. As a team **determine** your answers to these questions and **submit** them and then Deep Research get started. Typical run ≈ 7–8 min.
Now that the research is running you can **move on to Phase 4**. Once it is done, **press** the share icon and then **download** it as a pdf, then **change** the name to *Science_Evidence.pdf*.

expectedOutput.whyItMatters: This research dossier will provide the credible foundation for all your marketing claims, investor presentations, and customer communications. The peer-reviewed evidence will differentiate your startup from competitors making unsupported claims.
expectedOutput.nextSteps: With Science_Evidence.pdf complete, you're ready to turn your research into creativity and development in Phase 4: Hero Offer Ideation.

instructions: Enable Deep-Research feature in ChatGPT Enterprise
Customize the research prompt with your specific parameters
Allow sufficient time for the AI research process to complete
Download and properly name your research PDF for future phases
